featuresSection.heading: Finding Your Ideal Home Easily Search Independent Houses and Villas for Rent in Sector 67A
description: The rental landscape in Sector 67A Gurgaon is characterized by high-end construction and superior planning. Unlike apartment complexes, renting an independent house here provides maximum privacy, exclusive access to terraces and gardens, and significantly more customizable space.

We categorize the popular rental property types in Sector 67A to help you narrow down your search immediately, whether you need a compact home for a nuclear family or an expansive villa for multi-generational living near key infrastructural development.

features.title: Independent Floors
features.description: Ideal for those who want the freedom of a house without the maintenance complexities of a full villa. Independent floors offer dedicated parking, private entry, and typically feature 3 BHK or 4 BHK layouts. This option is highly popular for professionals requiring peace and separation from other tenants while enjoying premium finishes and modern building standards.

features.title: 3 BHK Houses
features.description: The standard family rental choice in Sector 67A providing a perfect balance of space and affordability within the independent house segment. These units often come with small private lawns or terraces. They are strategically located close to schools and market areas, ensuring convenience for daily family life in a secure and gated environment.

features.title: 4 BHK Villas
features.description: Representing the pinnacle of luxury rental living in Sector 67A. These large villas boast multiple living areas, servant quarters, expansive kitchens, and sometimes even private pools or dedicated study rooms. They are perfect for large expatriate families or high-net-worth individuals seeking uncompromising space and premium neighborhood amenities.

features.title: Duplex Houses
features.description: Offering a unique vertical living arrangement with connectivity between two floors usually housing living spaces on the lower level and bedrooms above. This layout provides a distinct feel of separation, perfect for families who need both entertainment space and quiet resting areas. These units are highly sought after for their contemporary architectural design.

features.title: Semi-Furnished Units
features.description: These homes are equipped with essential fixtures like modular kitchens, wardrobes, and high-quality light fittings but allow the tenant to bring their own furniture. This provides a cost-effective solution while allowing personalization of the living space. They offer excellent value for tenants planning longer lease durations in Sector 67A.

features.title: Fully Furnished Houses
features.description: The ultimate in convenience, offering move-in readiness with all appliances, furniture, and often even essential decor provided. While commanding a higher rent, these are preferred by corporate clients or those on short-term assignments who require zero setup time. Find high-quality, stylishly designed furnished rentals immediately.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About How to Rent House in Sector 67A Gurgaon
faqSection.description: Find quick answers to common queries regarding lease terms, rental procedures, and specific residential conditions in Sector 67A.

faqs.question: What is the typical lock-in period when renting a house or villa in Sector 67A
faqs.answer: The standard lock-in period for rental agreements in Sector 67A is usually six months. During this time, neither the tenant nor the landlord can terminate the agreement without incurring a penalty, which is often equivalent to two months' rent. After the lock-in period, a standard notice period of one to two months is typically required for termination.

faqs.question: How much security deposit is generally required for independent house rentals here
faqs.answer: For independent houses and villas in Sector 67A, the security deposit typically ranges from two to four months' equivalent rent. For high-end, fully-furnished properties, the deposit might be closer to four months. This amount is refundable upon the satisfactory termination of the lease, minus any charges for damages beyond normal wear and tear.

faqs.question: Are pets allowed in independent houses for rent in Sector 67A Gurgaon
faqs.answer: Whether pets are allowed depends entirely on the individual landlordâ€™s preference and the specific rules of the residential society, if applicable. While independent houses generally offer more flexibility than apartments, it is crucial to clarify pet policy upfront and have it explicitly documented in the lease agreement to avoid future disputes.

faqs.question: What documentation do I need to prepare to secure a rental property quickly
faqs.answer: To secure a house rental efficiently, you should have ready copies of your Aadhar Card, PAN Card, proof of employment or business registration, and bank statements for the last three months. Expatriates will also need a valid visa, passport, and company letter. Quick preparation of these documents ensures swift processing of the lease.

faqs.question: Who is responsible for property maintenance in a rented independent house
faqs.answer: Generally, the landlord is responsible for structural repairs and major appliance replacements not caused by tenant misuse. The tenant is typically responsible for day-to-day minor maintenance like cleaning, electrical faults, plumbing blockages, and garden upkeep, unless otherwise specified in the lease document.

faqs.question: Is parking available with most independent houses in Sector 67A
faqs.answer: Yes, nearly all independent houses and villas listed for rent in Sector 67A come with dedicated parking space, usually within the plot boundary or covered stilt area. We recommend verifying the number of covered and open parking slots available for each property if you have multiple vehicles.

faqs.question: What are the common lease durations offered in this sector
faqs.answer: The most common and preferred lease duration for residential properties in Sector 67A is 11 months, renewable thereafter. However, some landlords may offer 12-month or 24-month leases, especially for corporate clients or those offering favorable rental terms. Longer leases often include pre-agreed escalation clauses.

faqs.question: How do I calculate the total cost for moving into a rental house in Sector 67A
faqs.answer: The initial move-in cost typically involves paying the first month's rent in advance, the security deposit (2-4 months' rent), and potentially a brokerage fee (usually equivalent to one month's rent, which is shared between the tenant and landlord, or sometimes borne entirely by one party). Budget for utility connection charges as well.

faqs.question: Are the houses in Sector 67A located within gated colonies or independent plots
faqs.answer: Sector 67A features a mix of both. Many premium independent houses and villas are situated within secure, large gated residential communities offering superior shared amenities and security. Other independent plots might stand alone but usually feature their own private boundary walls and dedicated security arrangements.

faqs.question: What is the typical annual rent escalation rate expected
faqs.answer: The standard annual rent escalation rate for renewal in Sector 67A properties ranges between 5 percent and 10 percent. This rate is usually fixed and documented in the initial lease agreement to ensure predictability for both the landlord and the tenant for future renewal periods.
